function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exposure to COVID-19 through IoT devices and technologies","Impact":"Increased risk of infection and spread of the disease","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict hygiene protocols and regular sanitization of IoT devices","Technologies":"IoT devices with contactless features, UV-C disinfection technology","People":"Healthcare workers, building occupants, transportation staff","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, building management, transportation authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of data security in IoT devices used for COVID-19 management","Impact":"Risk of unauthorized access to sensitive health data and potential misuse","Mitigation":"Implementation of robust encryption and authentication measures for data transmission","Technologies":"Blockchain for secure data storage, encryption algorithms, biometric authentication","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, data managers","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, data management companies"},{"Description":"Reliance on IoT technology for disease management and control","Impact":"Over-reliance may lead to neglect of traditional public health measures","Mitigation":"Balancing IoT solutions with traditional public health interventions","Technologies":"IoT for data collection and analysis, integration with public health systems","People":"Public health authorities, policymakers, technology users","Owner":"Government agencies, public health organizations"}]}
